long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say hello to Leadspicker- the essential Chrome extension for sales professionals looking to close more deals and build better relationships with leads.

ðŸ“£ Boost your sales, grow your business, and connect with leads effortlessly with Leadspicker.

Leadspicker's Chrome Extension gives you access to verified contact information, the ability to engage with leads instantly, and deeper insights into the tools you use every day, including Gmail, Pipedrive, and Hubspot.

ðŸ”Ž LinkedIn Prospector and Email Automation - Speed up your prospecting with Leadspicker's verified contact data, insights, and automation directly through your LinkedIn and Email accounts. Use the extension to automatically locate contact details and add people to email sequences.

ðŸ“© Gmail Integration - Leverage Leadspicker's extension in Gmail to include contacts in automated follow-up sequences, add frequently used text, links, or paragraphs instantly, apply email templates, configure open and click tracking, and receive reminders to follow up with recipients who haven't responded.
